headline: Squid Signal
description: A speculative scientific proposal about possible communication behavior observed in a juvenile colossal squid. This post blends observation, poetic intuition, and biological grounding to propose a non-verbal, visual language in the deep.
whyItMatters: This piece dares to point at the edge of known biology with serious play. By treating behavior as symbol, it opens a door to a new form of language rooted in movement, posture, and gaze — and invites science to dream responsibly.
articleExcerpt: This is an emergent idea, one that you feel more before you know how you know it.
sourceFragments: This is far from traditional science but I promise it isn’t above it—just written my way.
This juvenile squid showed real signs of attempting to 'talk'.
My first attempt at speculative science based on observation and very basic anatomical/biological fact checking.
